biotools.summary: Allows retrieval, construction, and visualization of biological networks and allows for the analysis of high-throughput expression data by mapping onto network graphs. It queries the PathSys system, a combined database of biological pathways, gene regulatory networks, and protein interaction maps.

bioschemas.name: BiologicalNetworks
